name: RIWA
membership: RIWA Rhine is member of IAWR
goal: RIWA aims to achieve a good waterquality in the rivers Meuse Rhine and Schelde by preventing harmful substances from entering the river. The quality has to be of such high quality that a natural purification is sufficient to produce perfect drinking water from it.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Climate Action, Development, Environment, Public Health
euInitiatives:
Water Framework Directive
WFD Review Priority Substances
EU strategy Pharmaceuticals in the Evironment
